official_title: A Pilot Study to Evaluate the Diagnostic Performance of Pleural Touch Preparations in Pleuroscopy, a Prospective Study
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients who will undergo pleuroscopy with biopsy
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Patients with known malignant pleural effusion
* Inability or unwillingness to give informed consent
